description: The new national lockdown aims to tackle a sharp rise in infections and ease pressure on hospitals.
title: Covid: France returns to lockdown amid new surge
title_page: Covid: France returns to lockdown amid new surge - BBC News
maintext: The country reported 21,629 new coronavirus infections in the past 24 hours, a record in its crisis so far, and the number of confirmed Covid deaths was 202, the health ministry said. Poland's second wave of infection is much bigger than the first back in spring.
